QuestData.Title: Ever So Lonely
QuestData.Description: You work hard your whole life, and what do you get? Killed by a plague. Then you work even harder in undeath, and what do you get? Money, yes, and a small estate with a few pesky hangers-on, but happiness? Not so much.$b$bI'm lonely in my old age, $n. I need a companion. Use this leash on one of the murlocs at the Whispering Shore to the northwest. You'll have to weaken it first before it can be leashed. Then bring it back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Murloc Leash on a Vile Fin murloc at the Whispering Shore, then return it to Sedrick Calston at Calston Estate.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh, the pain of loneliness is too much to bear!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, look at him! Isn't he the most adorable thing you've ever seen? Thank you, $n. I feel more energetic already.
